name: Ready Set Go
description:
===PRESS THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON ON THE DOWNRIGHT SIDE OF THE GAME TO EXPAND IT===

Ready Set Go tells the story of Alex, a smart, very competent woman, who unfortunately has a very boring job. The game is set on a distant future where machines have taken over and made humans do their tedious work for them.

This interactive fiction was created during the Ludum Dare #31 and was made by Eduardo Emmerich (narrative designer) and Gustavo Gustavo Gabrielli (art director). The theme of this game jam was: Entire Game on One Screen.

You can send me your feedback at:

Twitter: @rurounikz

E-mail: edu.emmerich@gmail.com
